name: Bracket
title: docs.bracketapp.nl
shortDescription: Bracket is a tournament management system designed to help organizers set up and manage their events with ease. It supports various tournament formats like swiss, single elimination, and round-robin. Users can schedule matches, update scores, and display rankings live. Ideal for sports leagues, e-sports events, or any competitive event organizers looking for a flexible, cost-effective solution. With its open-source nature, Bracket ensures no vendor lock-in and full control over data.
pros: Live score tracking and public rankings
cons: May require technical knowledge to deploy

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Challonge
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers similar tournament tools with a focus on ease of use.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Battlefy
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focuses on e-sports with robust integration options.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Smash.gg
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Popular in gaming communities with extensive features.
